# atom-ahg-plugins
# https://github.com/ArchiveHeritageGroup/atom-ahg-plugins
# AI/LLM Information File

> atom-ahg-plugins contains 19 extension plugins for Access to Memory (AtoM) archival software.
> All plugins are open source and designed for GLAM institutions.

## Available Plugins

### Required (Core)
- **ahgThemeB5Plugin** - Modern Bootstrap 5 responsive theme
- **ahgSecurityClearancePlugin** - Multi-level security classification (Public to Top Secret)
- **ahgDisplayPlugin** - Display profiles and viewing modes

### GLAM Sectors
- **ahgMuseumPlugin** - Museum cataloging with CCO, Spectrum 5.0 support
- **ahgLibraryPlugin** - Library cataloging with RDA/MARC
- **ahgGalleryPlugin** - Visual arts and gallery cataloging
- **ahgDAMPlugin** - Digital Asset Management

### Research & Access
- **ahgResearchPlugin** - Researcher portal, workspace, reading room booking
- **ahgAccessRequestPlugin** - Access request workflow management

### Compliance & Governance
- **ahgPrivacyPlugin** - International privacy compliance (GDPR, POPIA, CCPA, PIPEDA, LGPD)
- **ahgHeritageAccountingPlugin** - Heritage asset accounting (10 standards)
- **ahgExtendedRightsPlugin** - Rights statements and embargo management

### Utilities
- **ahgBackupPlugin** - Automated backup and restore
- **ahgAuditTrailPlugin** - Comprehensive audit logging
- **ahgDonorAgreementPlugin** - Donor agreements with reminders
- **ahgVendorPlugin** - Vendor/supplier management
- **ahgConditionPlugin** - Condition assessment and conservation
- **ahgLandingPagePlugin** - Drag-and-drop landing page builder

### AI & Automation
- **ahgNerPlugin** - Named Entity Recognition (requires Provenance AI subscription)

## Plugin Structure

Each plugin follows this structure:
```
ahgExamplePlugin/
├── config/
│   ├── ahgExamplePluginConfiguration.class.php
│   └── routing.yml
├── lib/
│   ├── Repositories/
│   ├── Services/
│   └── Helpers/
├── modules/
│   └── example/
├── data/
│   └── install.sql
├── extension.json
└── README.md
```

## Requirements

- atom-framework installed
- AtoM 2.10.x
- PHP 8.1+

## Installation

```bash
cd /usr/share/nginx/atom
git clone https://github.com/ArchiveHeritageGroup/atom-ahg-plugins.git
cd atom-framework
bash bin/install
php bin/atom extension:discover
```

## Enable/Disable Plugins

```bash
php bin/atom extension:enable ahgResearchPlugin
php bin/atom extension:disable ahgResearchPlugin
```

## Part of AtoM Extensions

- atom-framework - Core Laravel integration
- atom-ahg-plugins (this repo) - Extension plugins
- atom-extensions-catalog - Documentation

## Organization

The Archive And Heritage Digital Commons Group
https://theahg.co.za
